trait.name: Flyby
text: The two-headed eagle doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Two-headed
text: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

trait.name: Wakeful
text: While the two-headed eagle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The two-headed eagle makes two bite attacks and one talons attack.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the two-headed eagle can't use its talons on another target.
